title: Can I access my external on my phone?
content:
I'm trying to view the files on my WD external with my phone, but whenever I tried to connect it, my phone becomes inaccessible by a constant reboot. 

I can't even access the phone or the apps. 

When I unplugged the external, everything came back to normal. I know it is not my external because I can open it on the computer and other Android devices just fine. 

I have the current Android 11 software installed. I'm not sure if this is a software error or not.

I appreciate any feedback. Thank you
